derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French rene, based on Latin retinere 'retain'

entry.def: Reins are the thin leather straps attached round a horse's neck which are used to control the horse.
Journalists sometimes use the expression the reins or the reins of power to refer to the control of a country or organization.

example.ex: He was determined to see the party keep a hold on the reins of power...
example.tran: 他决意要确保这个政党掌握政权。

entry.def: If you give free rein to someone, you give them a lot of freedom to do what they want.

example.ex: The government continued to believe it should give free rein to the private sector in transport.
example.tran: 政府仍然认为应该给予交通领域的私营企业以经营自由。

entry.def: If you keep a tight rein on someone, you control them firmly.

example.ex: Her parents had kept her on a tight rein with their narrow and inflexible views.
example.tran: 她的父母观念狭隘而僵化，对她管束很严。

means.word_mean: 1. one of a pair of long straps (usually connected to the bit or the headpiece) used to control a horse

sentences.sentence: "he took up the reins of government"

means.word_mean: 1. control and direct with or as if by reins;
2. stop or slow up one's horse or oneself by or as if by pulling the reins;

sentences.sentence: "They reined in in front of the post office"

means.word_mean: 3. stop or check by or as if by a pull at the reins;

sentences.sentence: "He reined in his horses in front of the post office"

auth_sentence.content: Efforts to rein in inflation have failed so far.

auth_sentence.content: He is warning against giving our unconscious decisions free rein.

Sentence.sentence: They are also hoping the court's ruling will rein in patent law, which is increasingly being used to claim new life forms as private property.

This case gives the court an opportunity to rein in the growing use of patents to protect genetically engineered crops and other life forms―but the court may well use it to give this trend a powerful new endorsement
To avoid fiscal (财政) meltdown, public pensions and health-care provision will have to be reined back severely and taxes may have to go up.
